transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hanji?

Executive: Hi Hemal sir, very good morning.

Customer: Very good morning.

Executive: Hasmukhi ji baat kar rahi thi sir.

Customer: Haan boliye boliye.

Executive: Haan ji kaise hain sir aap?

Customer: Bas bas badhiya badhiya.

Executive: Badhiya main wahi maine isi ke liye call kiya sir ki main aapko ek baar inform kar du ki aapka jo mere paas mail aaya hua tha matlab jo humne aapse mail liya tha PNS defaulter ke liye wo already maine uska mail kar diya hai.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai? Haan uska usse already process start ho gaya hai jaise hi wo remove ho jata hai mere paas aa jayega information ki ha remove ho gaya hai fir hum uske according ek baar discussion karke ek baar visibility check karke check kar lenge theek hai aur jo maine aapko bola tha aapke catalog pe kaam karne ke liye wo bhi main December ke first week tak main try kar rahi hu ki wo main aapka complete kar du.

Customer: Theek hai okay fine.

Executive: Haan hai na baki iske alava agar abhi aapko koi aur issue hai to wo aap mujhe bata dijiye.

Customer: Bas main socha ek baar aapse follow up le leti hu dobara.

Executive: Nahi nahi koi koi issue nahi hai abhi to message ka aapka number hai to main jo bhi hoga wo bata dunga aapko whatsapp pe.

Executive: Bilkul okay okay ha wo jyada better rehta hai sir ki aap kyunki kai bari na samne wala person na busy rehta hai call answer karne karne mein.

Customer: Nahi actually maine 12 baje se pehle isliye phone karne ke liye bola baad mein kya online PC pe aana hai ya fir kahin pe karna hai to wo available nahi ho to ho nahi payega.

Executive: Haan haan koi baat nahi sir matlab ye hai ki jaise telephonic call to hoti rehti hai lekin kabhi kabhi kya aap bol rahe ho ki PC pe aao ya fir IndiaMART mein wo login karna hai ya video conference karna hai to possibility nahi hogi 12 baje ke baad.

Customer: Ji ji bilkul bilkul bilkul wo possible nahi hoga nahi nahi to mujhe aisa kuch karna nahi tha maine socha ki ha aapne bhi mail kiya mujhe to thoda client ko bhi sir dekho information hona chahiye ki ha jo humne unko commit kiya hai ya fir jo bhi unke catalog mein issues the uske upar work ho raha hai ya nahi ho raha hai right to isliye wo information dena hamara kaam hai to isliye maine socha aapko ek baar inform kar dungi ki ha aapke catalog pe still main work kar rahi hu aur main usse already mail kar chuki hu jaise hi mere ko kuch feedback aata hai main aapko waha pe update kar dungi baki catalog ke baad ek baar hum start kar denge main cheez wahi hai na aapko wo dhyan rakhna hai ki apan ko jo replacement of lapsa ya substitute of lapsa aur linian alkaline benzene replacement karke jo ek hi product ke teen name se apan ne launch kiye hue catalog ke andar product ek hi hai lekin kya koi koi log substitute bolte hai koi replacement bolte hai koi acid slurry bolta hai lapsa ki jagah pe kyunki full form pata nahi rehta hai kisi ko linian alkaline benzene sulphonic acid full form actual name wo hai uska lekin kya sab log acid slurry acid slurry karte rehte hai ye sab.

Executive: Ji ji ji maine bhi to us din yahi discussion kiya tha na aapse ki jo sabse jyada hai acid slurry ke naam se hi aapka ye catalog actual mein wo mam hai hi nahi.

Customer: Haan log usi mein naam promote ho gaya hai acid slurry ka ji ji aur maine uska reason bhi bataya tha ki agar aap koi bhi product apne naye name se agar aap dal bhi rahe ho IndiaMART ke level par to minimum usme 10 aise supplier hone chahiye jo same name se IndiaMART par wo nahi apne ko wo nahi karna hai apne ko apne ko karna wahi hai apne ko kaise karna hai abhi wo ke koi bhi banda x person ya y person jo bhi search kar raha hai acid slurry ya lapsa ko to apni product usko catalog ke andar dikhti chahiye replacement of lapsa searching ke andar bas apne ko aisa chahiye taki kisi ko kya acid slurry ke 1000 2000 vendor hote hai replacement of lapsa ke kam hai means 50 se 70% public ko pata nahi hai ki market ke andar replacement bhi aa gaya hai ye chemicals ka to jab tak wo chemicals promote nahi hoga first page pe tab tak wo public ko pata nahi chalega ke ye chemicals aaya hua hai tab tak inquiry nahi aayegi.

Executive: Haan bilkul main main yahi cheez maine yahi cheez aapko us din samjhai bhi thi ki waha pe na basically kya hai ki abhi aapka promote aapka jo product hai wo abhi market mein actual mein promote ho nahi pa raha hai jo aap logo ne launch kiya abhi jo aap mujhe bata rahe the to uska hi wo reason maine aapko bataya tha ki minimum 10 supplier bhi agar aapka hote na us product line mein to waha pe kya hota ek category wo ban jati aur fir hum usko market mein promote karna start kar chuke hote right aur dusra maine aapko yahi bataya tha ki waha pe aapko karna yahi hoga ki jo aapke paas acid slurry sab ki jo requirements aapke paas abhi aa rahi hai aapko unko hi apne products ki knowledge deni padegi dusra maine aapko bola tha ki wo to hum log karenge lekin aapke yaha pe jo level searching ka level hai na koi bhi banda x x ya y banda ya z banda koi bhi acid slurry bhi search mare na to usko front of replacement dikhna chahiye first apna requirement waha pe aapka catalog dikhna chahiye waha pe wo abhi nahi ho pa raha hai aur usi ke liye maine pehle bola tha ki pehle PNS defaulter remove karwate hain fir uske baad main khud se check karungi sir jaise maine aapse pucha bhi tha maine kuch market mein competitors bhi dikhaye the kuch maine aapko keywords ke suggestion bhi diye the ki ye bhi hum bolte hain kya right to uska aapko ye tha ki utna idea tha nahi aapko right to maine aapko bola ki main ek product alag hai wo product alag hai actually mein kya wo partially replacement karke bech rahe hain 100% replacement koi nahi hai aur world mein ek hamari company aisi hai jo 100% replacement de rahi hai.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai to wo maine bola tha ki ek baar main uska bhi check kar leti hu ki agar client agar hai unme agar wo already register kara ke chala rahe hain ya fir aapka jo product line hai usko aur hum kis kis keyword se market mein promote kar sakte hain right jo common ho sakta hai jo log search karte hain to wo hum ek baar apne catalog mein addition karne ka try karenge to isi ke liye maine aapse next week tak ka time liya tha ki ek baar next week tak na main wo karke dekhti hu theek hai baki koi issue hai mera number hai aapke paas mere ko directly waha par message kar sakte hai theek hai ji okay thank you so much thank you and happy journey sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants product to be visible in search.

- Customer wants PNS defaulter to be removed.

- Customer wants catalog to be updated.



Resolution:

- Executive informed mail sent for PNS defaulter removal.

- Executive will work on catalog by December first week.

- Executive will update customer on feedback.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, pns defaulter, product visibility, replacement
